Key Match Events: The match between India and Canada was abandoned due to a wet outfield
Pre-Game Insights: India had already secured passage to the Super 8, so they weren't too concerned about the weather situation in Florida
They cancelled their scheduled net session for Friday
Post-Match Reflections: Canada finished third on the Group table with three points
India finish top of the table with seven points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The outfield was looking quite horrible, dark green footmarks all over the place and new ones being formed wherever anyone walks
The ground looks as soggy as it gets
There hasn't been even a quarter of the kind of rain that came out yesterday, remember
Others: Rishabh Pant's comeback performance was praised by India's fielding coach T Dilip
